definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: Adam was to beautify it and protect it.
sentences.chinese: 亚当的工作是要让它变得荣美，并加以保护。

sentences.english: I agree that we come to God more when we were in difficulties or hardship.
sentences.chinese: 现在让我们来看神创造的荣美。

sentences.english: May the favor of the Lord our God rest upon us;
sentences.chinese: 愿主我们神的荣美，归于我们身上。

sentences.english: Till the beauty of Jesus be seen in me.
sentences.chinese: 直到耶稣的荣美在我彰显。

sentences.english: May the favor(the beauty) of the Lord our God rest upon us;
sentences.chinese: 愿主我们神的荣美归于我们身上。

sentences.english: Lord, I know only your beauty and saw only goodness from you.
sentences.chinese: 主啊，从你我只知道荣美，只看见仁慈。

sentences.english: Thine eyes shall see the king in his beauty: they shall behold the land that is very far off.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼必见王的荣美，必见辽阔之地。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
